attributes.action: Make st George's day (April 23rd) a national bank holiday as it should already!
attributes.background: April 23rd is an important and often overlooked day in the United kingdom,a lot of people scoffing at the thought, but why? We celebrate st Patrick's day without a second thought why has our own patron saint been forgotten?

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104466

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
